website_summaries.verdict: Among the top choices for an affordable walker that doesn't skimp on safety or performance.
pros: Generates plenty of praise for its removable features and versatility on all surfaces
cons: We wish the wheels turned all the way around

customer_reviews.title: My Baby Liked It
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. Comfortable and convenient for my baby. It has adjustable hight so I can adjust with your baby need. The good point is that Back wheel is with rubber so in general it is not going back without hard push and It go ahead smoothly. Overall the Wlaker is light and simple. My baby liked it. I recommend it who looking for a convenient walker for his baby within a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: CHOWDHURY

customer_reviews.title: SAFETY FIRSTS PUTS #BabyFirst!~
customer_reviews.text: We bought this oh so darling little #SAFETYFIRST, #ReadySetWalk walker in the #DiamondBlush fabric pattern for my great niece for Christmas 2019 and she LOVES IT. So easy to assemble and I love the little detachable activity center with specialty toys, included, PLUS the handy little, convenient tray designed into the walker so that she can occupy herself AND nibble away on her treats while mom is doing quick little tasks around the house. Love the "stow-away" feature which is such a bonus. And Safety First baby products is a long-time, trusted brand name that has spoken for itself for years. Very satisfied buyer in this household! ~XOX
customer_reviews.author: Rannie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and sturdy and arrived very quickly
customer_reviews.text: First off, it showed up a day before expected which was great! A huge plus to deliver before the delivery date. Bought for our 5 month old. It was easy to set up, everything clicks and snaps together. The toys and seat are a great quality, the lowest setting works great for her to reach the floor, she can’t walk just yet but it’ll be great when she can. I does not work well on carpet but it’s great on our hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Ace

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my granddaughter when she was 6 months old. She's still using it 3 months later. She has yet to figure out how to move it around much but she loves sitting in it and playing with her toys or eating her snacks. She loves the sounds that the toys make and the music that plays. It was money well spent and it is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good !
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous at first but after I got it I loved it. It’s not too expensive but not cheap . Daughter loves the toys on it. It is a tad difficult to turn but I think after a tad wear and tear it will be good.
customer_reviews.author: SunflowerAngel

customer_reviews.title: Best for your buck
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift and it was extremely easy to put together our baby is little and the height adjustment legs on side is very easy to use. This product is awesome. the package was professionally packaged and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona BackBone

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandbaby so that she could gain some confidence while trying to walk. I wasn't looking for anything too expensive considering she is almost 1. Well I was not disappointed! My lil ladybug was so delighted to explore her surroundings and I could not recommend this enough. Not a bad deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Light eyez

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together, you don’t need any tools to assemble everything snaps together. And is really easy to clean. Very durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cat S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy with Caution
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely upset at the performances of this baby walker. Initially when I gotten it, I have become very cautious of one particular toy on this walker. I knew something bad was going to happen, but I couldn’t decipher it. Yesterday, my 7 month old sisters finger had gotten stuck in the toy and it ripped off skin from her finger. I am EXTREMELY upset and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: shah

customer_reviews.title: Grandson LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for little ones who want to sit up but cannot fully do so...he loves it! And it is safe.
customer_reviews.author: pp1344

customer_reviews.title: didnt work
customer_reviews.text: it will only move forward and its not study at all this is not safety first at all also this seating area is small so this is for a child that is 6 month or younger
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this walker, it has 3 different levels of height. My daughter likes to play with the toys it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Jenny V.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME AND EASY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my niece and she’s loving it🥺 she’s getting the hang of it but man in a month or 2 she’s gonna be going crazy at it
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was cute and the price was right
customer_reviews.text: Can't really tell as it is still in the box. The box came partly open. Hopefully everything is in it. I'm sure they will like it when he put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Worked good a little hard for kid to walk in the wheels add super tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that it feels like it has limitations on mobilety.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rodríguez Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Super quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Friday and it arrived the next day! I purchased this for my niece, as my daughter had the same brand of walker. I know it'll be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Merissa Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Dirty!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This looked used and was disgusting with yellow and black all over the white tray part! Everything else looked new. I wiped everything down and sanitized everything and looks new but was very disappointed. I'm sorry that I had this sitting in the box for 5months waiting to used when I could have exchanged it. This was a gift from my Amazon baby registration.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Medina

customer_reviews.title: Child Safety
customer_reviews.text: So my 8 month old was playing in the walker and she got her finger stuck in between the plastic and the flip rattle. If we would have picked her up not knowing her finger was stuck something seriously could've happened. Need to know how to report that incident.
customer_reviews.author: Destinie

product_meta.title: Safety 1st Ready, Set, Walk! DX Developmental Walker, Diamond Sky
feature_bullets: 3 child developmental toys with multiple activities
Module with 12 charming songs and flashing light
Adjustable baby walker with 3 different heights, tested to ensure each one provides the best fit
Extra-wide base designed for superior stability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars156 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
